item.title: cdh-5.13 quickstart vm 使用笔记
item.description: 下载和导入虚拟机. 下载 cdh-quickstart-vm 导入 vm初始信息收集 [cloudera@quickstart ~]$ uname -a Linux quickstart.cloudera 2.6.32-573.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Jul 23 15:44:03 UTC 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux $ cat /etc/issue CentOS release 6.7 (Final) Kernel \r on an \m vm里的cdh服务当前是使用操作系统的init系统管理的，而不是"Cloudera Manager” By default, the Cloudera QuickStart VM run Cloudera's Distribution including Apache Hadoop (CDH) under Linux's service and configuration management. If you wish to migrate to Cloudera Manager, you must run one of the following commands.
